trans-unit.source: Provides additional event information about <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> processing.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關的其他事件資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>處理。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the dispatcher has no more operations to process.
trans-unit.target: 發送器已沒有要處理的作業時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the dispatcher thread when there are no more pending work items.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何暫止的工作項目時，發送器執行緒會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 在作業中止時發生。

trans-unit.source: Any thread can abort an operation; therefore, this event can be raised by any thread.
trans-unit.target: 任何執行緒可以中止作業。因此，任何執行緒可以引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the dispatcher thread after the operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成之後，發送器執行緒會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an operation is posted to the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 發生於作業張貼至發送器。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this event occurs during a call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，會發生此事件期間呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can occur during a call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> if any priority other than <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> is specified, or if the destination dispatcher is owned by a different thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫期間可能會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>如果以外任何優先權<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>指定，或如果目的地發送器由不同的執行緒所擁有。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any thread can post operations; therefore, this event can be raised by any thread.
trans-unit.target: 任何執行緒可以張貼作業;因此，任何執行緒可以引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the priority of an operation is changed.
trans-unit.target: 變更作業的優先順序時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Any thread can change the priority of operations; therefore, this event can be raised by any thread.
trans-unit.target: 任何執行緒可以變更的優先順序的作業。因此，任何執行緒可以引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an operation is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在叫用作業時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
